column5: Hi all,  Just sharing a couple of pics of my son Jack....only 6 weeks old but the eyes say it all....he watches stuff like a hawk, hyper alert already.        WITH EYES LIKE THIS HE WONT EVEN NEED POLARIZED SHADES!            HE HELPS WITH MY POSTS TOO....LOL          I have to also add this picture of Jack on his new blanket he received as a gift from OFC member Dnthmn. Daniel....such acts of kindness to  relative strangers is rare these days....thank you soooo much.      DNTHMN SENT US THIS BLANKET HIS WIFE MADE AFTER SEEING MY NEW BABY POST 6 WEEKS AGO
The wife loves the first cute shot. TFS.
Beautiful looking boy. You guys getting any sleep?
Great looking boy!! An OFC'r for sure!!

I like the first pic Simon  Real determination looking.... as if he's telling you to quit playing around with your fishing gear LOL Thanks for sharing those lovely pics with us  On a side note.... what is the ice condition on your lake? Are you able to get out at all?  Jacques

I am....lol....my wife....not so much.....as long as my (man) breasts dont begin to lactate it should continue so for a while too.....lol      The ice is taking its own precious time this year...its been kinda unsafe for at least a week now. It snowed yesterday...and keeps etting below zerto at night despite being an average 9 degrees C during the days.....might get out next week...might have to go and find a puddle somewhere tomorrow and cast out....i'm beginning to shake violently from fishing withdrawals....lol

That first picture is priceless, the look of determination is incredible.  He'll make a fine fisherman for sure. Thanks for the great pics and post Simon.  Dnthmn my hat's off to you and your wife on the wonderful gift
Great looking little guy you got there Limeyangler! He really does look intent on something.
great pics.  he 's gettin big too  TB
